cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("MIDIVelocityZone")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../FRUT/prefix/FRUT/cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


set(VelocityZone_jucer_FILE
  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/VelocityZone.jucer"
)


set(JUCE_MODULES_GLOBAL_PATH "/Applications/JUCE/modules")


jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_FORMAT_VERSION "1"
  PROJECT_FILE "${VelocityZone_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "JWXW3a"
)

  PROJECT_NAME "MIDIVelocityZone"
  PROJECT_VERSION "0.0.1"
  COMPANY_NAME "krmnn"

)
